beginning:
We will take you to explore some of the most famous National Parks in the US. All of the clues can be found on the NPS website.

2. Although remote, this national park boasts the biggest size

4. Find the source of this background picture
5. ‚ô™I've seen it rainin' fire in the sky‚ô™
6. The child of Dorr
7. Where Angels land
8. Here you‚Äôll find A. mississippiensis
9. It earns its name, this land of stone and light

Once you have them all, visit the main National Parks Service Wikipedia page.

clues.text: You did it! Here‚Äôs a piece of the final password: 2

interactive.prompt: In what year was the park established?

interactive.prompt: How many miles long is the scenic Skyline Drive?

clues.text: You did it! Congrats on exploring all the National Parks!

interactive.prompt: Now that you‚Äôve solved the clues, sum up the numbers, and identify which national park that represents, in the order that they were founded.
